results.name: Array A(i,j) giving the square of distance from (i,j) to the location where A163357(i,j) is situated in array A054238(i,j), listed antidiagonally as A(0,0), A(0,1), A(1,0), A(0,2), A(1,1), A(2,0), ...
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..32895
example: The top left 8x8 corner of this array:
xref: a(n) = A163900(A163357(n)). Positions of zeros: A165403. See also A163898, A163904.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 19 2009
